article_node.title: Stefon Diggs noncommittal on Patriots debut as he recovers from injury: 'Taking it day by day'
article_node.summary: Stefon Diggs is making progress in his recovery from a torn ACL but remains uncertain about his availability for the New England Patriots' season opener against the Las Vegas Raiders. Despite passing a physical and practicing on a limited basis, Diggs expressed that both he and the coaching staff are not overly optimistic about his return for Week 1. He signed a three-year deal with the Patriots after a challenging season with the Houston Texans.
